About the film: LES PETITES ECOLIERS (THE SCHOOLGIRLS) - This Frederic Lansac French XXX film is one of Brigitte Lahaie's very best. Not only is Brigitte is top form (as ever), but she is surrounded by several other lovely young lasses in schoolgirl uniforms (including the beautiful Marlyn Jess, who performs a brilliant bound-and-gagged sex scene with Brigitte that is worth the price of admission alone). In this one, Brigitte's character is busted for running a brothel and must find herself a 'legitimate' form of work. Ever the altruist, she opens a sex school for sexually dysfunctional young women. Here the fresh-scrubbed and innocent-looking young women learn the ins and outs (sorry) of having sex with men and women. Brigitte stands before the class to demonstrate technique then the girls practice on male staff members (pun intended), passing handymen and, of course, each other. In the end, all the girls pass with flying colors and celebrate their graduation with the greatest school play of all time: a sexed up set of costumed faerie tales for adults complete with a wolf in grandma's clothing with a raging erection!
